name: Grizzly Adventures - Crazy Bear Platformer
description:
Grizzzly Adventure is a free-to-play game, complete with two 10 levels packs available as inApp purchasable items, only if you want an extended gaming experience!

An evil sorcerer has taken control of Grizzly's forest and driven the creatures completely mad. With the animals under control and the help of a few minions, the sorcerer plans to bring the forest down, but Grizzzly's not gonna take it in these woods.
